activities:
Data Services Inc. acts as a Data Processor (1) and therefore processes data in accordance with instructions from the Data Controller (2) .  As a Data Processor, Data Services Inc., shall not transfer data to a Third Party (3)  without instructions from the Data Controller.  Data Services Inc. will process the data for one-time use and only for the purpose for which it was intended.
Written instructions shall be provided by the Data Controller outlining the authority granted to the Data Services Inc. as the Data Processor, and specify in the instructions, the limits of that processing so that Data Services Inc. may keep on record our classification as a Data Processor.  Without written instructions, Data Services Inc. will not be liable for the actions of the Data Controller.
Footnotes:
1A data processor is an entity that processes personal data on behalf of a data controller.
2A data controller is an entity that determines the purposes and means for processing personal data.  
3A third party is any entity other than a data controller or data processor.
